mapper.insert: insert into board(board_no, title, contents, mem_no) values(board_seq.nextval, #{title }, #{contents }, #{mem_no })
mapper.select: SELECT board_no, title, written_time, answer FROM board WHERE mem_no = #{mem_no} ORDER BY board_no DESC

SELECT DISTINCT b.board_no, b.title, b.contents, b.mem_no, m.mem_name, c.contents cmt FROM board b, comment_tb c, member m WHERE b.board_no = #{board_no } AND b.board_no = c.board_no(+) AND b.mem_no = m.mem_no
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO comment_tb(comment_no, board_no, contents, mem_no) VALUES(comment_seq.nextval, #{board_no }, #{contents }, 3)
